DOC.brief_summary: This study design investigate whether new drug may offer safe effective treatment patient overactive bladder .
DOC.brief_title: A Multicenter , Double-Blind , Randomized , Placebo-Controlled , Phase II Study MK0594 Patients With Overactive Bladder
DOC.criteria: Patients predominantly urge incontinence overactive bladder episode Patients must meet minimum eligibility requirement ( e.g. , average number micturitions/day ) base screen diary card History Diabetes insipidus , uncontrolled hyperglycemia hypercalcemia Lower urinary tract symptom associate benign prostatic hypertrophy Active current Urinary Tract Infections ( UTIs ) Surgery correct prolapse uterus stress incontinence
